alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schoharie; Southern Fulton; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Schenectady; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 02 at 11:00PM EST until February 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation possible. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 7 or more inches possible. Ice accretions of a light glaze to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...The central Mohawk Valley, Schoharie Valley, Eastern Catskills, and the Helderbergs in eastern New York. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commutes. Snowfall rates could approach an inch an hour Thursday night into Friday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
